title: Add an upgrade shell to an application

module.description: Path to the Angular module with a bootstrap component (e.g., --module=src/app/app.module.ts).

angularJsImport.description: Import expression of the AngularJS application (e.g., --angularJsImport=some_node_module/my_app).

angularJsModule.description: The name of the main AngularJS module (e.g., --angularJsModule=myAppModule). If not specified, the last segment of angularJsImport will be used.

angularJsCmpSelector.description: The selector of an AngularJS component (e.g., --angularJsCmpSelector=myComponent)
